defaultOpen.description: The open state of the hover card when it is initially rendered. Use when you do not need to control its open state.
defaultOpen.description_zh: 悬停卡最初呈现时的打开状态。在不需要控制其打开状态时使用。

:v-model:open.description: The controlled open state of the hover card. Must be binded with v-model.
:v-model:open.description_zh: 悬停卡的受控打开状态。必须与 v-model 绑定。

:openDelay.description: The duration from when the mouse enters the trigger until the hover card opens.
:openDelay.description_zh: 从鼠标进入触发器到悬停卡打开的持续时间。

:closeDelay.description: The duration from when the mouse leaves the trigger or content until the hover card closes.
:closeDelay.description_zh: 从鼠标离开触发器或内容到悬停卡关闭的持续时间。
